  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Equation Math-O</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung Mathe-O</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths-O D'Équation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Math-O-O Da Equação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica-O Di Equazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξίσωση ματχ-ο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matema'ticas-O De la Ecuación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will review different types of equations by playing Math-O.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer wiederholen unterschiedliche Typen 
von Gleichungen, indem sie Mathe-O spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants passeront en revue différents 
types d'équations en jouant des Maths-O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes reverão tipos diferentes de 
equações jogando o math-O-O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi rivedranno i tipi differenti di 
equazioni giocando il Per la matematica-O.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναθεωρήσουν τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους εξισώσεων με το παιχνίδι του ματχ-ο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes repasarán diversos tipos de 
ecuaciones jugando Matema'ticas-O.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
